reviews.review: Lo recomiendo pero esta mal optimizado, en cualquier PC medianamente buena te corre trancado, pero igual alto juego.

Solid fun, always learning something. Tests muscle memory and reflexes more than any other game I have ever played. Only downside is it is plagued with many cheats/scripts even on verified games. Happens about every 1/10 so that game is just a write off. 2 v 2 wingman is great fun too.
Idk might need another 1000 hours before I decide
It's fun to play especially with your friends :)
its ok i guess. not very appealing, hard to play for a long time. 3/10
